::DeathStorm/Striker::

DeathStorm growls quietly. Too quietly for Suukie to hear. This was getting 
difficult.

"For the second time: I am Kluster, a maximal fighter. I pulled my gun on 
your friends because I had seen honest Maximals like us go bad before. I 
couldn't take the risk. But I did not fire. A predacon would have fired."

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Striker lands behind Liono. He had flown off after him when Liono's meeting 
was finished.

"I have a plan, Liono," He says, "We can take out Megatron while he is 
without a base or protection."
